message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $900000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $825000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $775000. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to your budget, Bob. I can do $780000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close, but I think I can do $765000. Can you meet me at that price?
